Navigate and Customize Tosca Testsuite!
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
We realize that navigating through Tosca Testsuite can be daunting at first. Here are a few shortcuts that will help you use Tosca Testsuite like a pro:
- Customize your toolbar <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/822/content/tchb/videos/video_customizetoolbar.htm> to make frequently used buttons easier for you
- Keep an overview of Test Cases through Component Folders <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/822/index.htm#tchb/component_folders.htm>
- Learn to use the search query <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/822/content/tchb/videos/video_search.htm> by using regular expressions
Hope you’ve found this helpful! More useful tips are headed your way! Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team trial@tricentis.com <mailto:trial@tricents.com>
